name: Crazy Mummy Mystery
description:
Crazy Mummy Mystery Adventure Game By Vijay, Mark, Alok, Paul:

This crazy mummy hunt adventure game included multiple levels that has mazes with increasing difficulty as the game progresses.  Multiple top-down maze scenes where the player has to navigate around different maze levels of increasing difficulty to find all keys to unlock the door on each level to reach the next maze level. In each maze scene, the player has to find all keys to unlock the door. Also, a concept for this game would be that the adventurer or player falls into an ancient temple place where they are age reversed. Then, that player has to collect keys, navigate around spike and poison traps, following enemies, obstacles and use keys to unlock the doors to escape the maze levels.  

Obstacles: closely placed walls, following enemies, and poison near the keys and the door, that if touched, restarts player to beginning of each maze level scene

Traps: spikes that restart player to beginning of maze level
